name: Space Star - Heart of a Soldier
name_original: Space Star - Heart of a Soldier
description:
Are you ready to discover a new Galaxy?

A friend's loyalty leads him to join The Space Star Army to learn what happened to his best friend.

His friend was joined army 4 months ago and one day, The Space Star Army announced his friend's dead while he was fighting Alien Race. He couldn't believe his friend's death. So he decided to join The Space Star Army and learn what really happened to his best friend. But he didn't know what is going to happen to him while searching his friend? Join and help him to find what happened to his best friend.

Discover The Space with 10 different Space Ships.
Use 5 Type of weapon with 5 different ammo type.
Discover 20 different Secret Coordination.
Collect message capsules about His Friend Nick Wednesday.
Complete missions to grow faster and rank up.
Play Challanges, divine bosses and Alien Palace to show your power.
Defeat more than 20 Alien Enemy Ships and Creatures.
